mapper.select: select no, room, send_nick, recv_nick, send_time, read_time, content, read_check from message where no in (select max(no) from message group by room) and (send_nick = #{nickname} or recv_nick=#{nickname}) order by no desc;
select count(no) from message where recv_nick=#{nickname} and read_check=0 and room=#{room}

choose.when: insert into message (no, room, send_nick, recv_nick, send_time, content, image, read_check) values(default, #{room}, #{send_nick}, #{recv_nick}, now() at time zone 'Asia/Seoul', #{content}, #{image}, 0);
choose.otherwise: insert into message (no, room, send_nick, recv_nick, send_time, content, image, read_check) values(default, #{room}, #{send_nick}, #{recv_nick}, now() at time zone 'Asia/Seoul', #{content}, #{image}, 0);

mapper.select: select count(no) from message where (recv_nick = #{recv_nick} and send_nick=#{send_nick}) or (send_nick = #{recv_nick} and recv_nick=#{send_nick})
select room from message where (recv_nick = #{recv_nick} and send_nick=#{send_nick}) or (send_nick = #{recv_nick} and recv_nick=#{send_nick}) limit 1 offset 0
